sense.def:
A witness to an event
je oseba, ki je videla neki dogodek.

seg.quote: Witnesses to the murder told what they had seen.

sense.def:
To witness something
pomeni videti, kako se nekaj zgodi;

seg.quote: At least fifteen people witnessed the attack.

sense.def:
A witness
je oseba, ki pride na sodišče, da bi povedala, kaj ve o določenem zločinu ali kakšnem drugem dogodku.

seg.quote: Other witnesses were called to give evidence.

sense.def:
A witness
je tudi oseba, ki zapiše svoje ime na listino, ki smo jo podpisali, in tako potrdi, da je podpis res naš.

Kadar nekdo
witnesses someone's signature
, zapiše svoje ime pod podpis neke druge osebe in tako potrdi, da je podpis res njen.

seg.quote: Now everything is signed and witnessed.

sense.def:
To be witness to something
pomeni videti, kako se je nekaj zgodilo;

cit.quote: biti priča, videti na svoje lastne oči

seg.quote: This was the first time I was witness to one of his rages.
This lack of action bears witness to a complacency which has survived two World Wars.
